actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to correct certain inequities in the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement for such service on or after the effective date of the National Guard Technicians Act of 1968. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8332(b), 8334(c), 8339)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to correct certain inequities in the crediting of National Guard technician service in connection with civil service retirement, and for other purposes.
